name: ECO - 002B
description: Second drop in my series exploring the climate crisis and mankind's inability to meaningfully respond to the diffuse threat we all face.    This drop is part of a wider series of work using a fusion of traditional & digital techniques, the pieces explore the climate emergency / species loss / civilisational collapse and most importantly, hope.  I will be investing half of the money I make through the NFTs into local tree planting.  The sister piece to this work will be released on Foundation
